version_description:
Welcome to the updated version of the Etihad Airways Mobile App. We are working hard to make your app experience even better. This update includes:

1. Functionality for accessing loyalty transaction history

2. Support for ID Travel (Etihad-provided ticket) check-ins

3. Bug fixes and performance enhancements

Please continue to send us your valuable feedback from within the app or via MobileAppFeedback@etihad.ae. We look forward to hearing from you.

New features:
- New app icon
- Add a promo code as part of your flight search for discounted fares

Improvements:
- Improvements to login reliability
- More accurate push notifications when check-in opens
- Improvements to US flight bookings
- Improvements to fare breakdown display

As always, thank you so much for using the app. If you have any feedback, please contact us on MobileAppFeedback@etihad.ae

Introducing the updated version of the Etihad Airways mobile app. We’ve been working hard to make your app experience even better. This update includes:

1. Now pay with Apple Pay (available in Apple supported countries)
2. Join Etihad Guest and access a world of rewards. Simply book a flight and join our programme.
3. Bug fixes and performance enhancements

We like hearing your feedback. Contact us using the app or via MobileAppFeedback@etihad.ae.

Welcome to the updated version of the Etihad Airways Mobile App. With this latest release, you can:
1. Pay with Apple Pay (available in Apple Pay-supported countries).
2. Purchase Extra Legroom Seats during the booking flow.
3. Buy additional baggage allowance during the booking process and get 20% off airport rates up to 48 hours before you fly.
4. Join Etihad Guest and access a world of rewards. Simply book a flight and join our loyalty programme.
5. We have also made some bug fixes and performance enhancements.
Please continue to send us your feedback from within the app or via MobileAppFeedback@etihad.ae. We look forward to hearing from you.

Bug fixes and general enhancements.

Please continue to send us your valulable feedback from within the app or via mobileappfeedback@etihad.ae. We look forward to hearing from you

Welcome to the updated version of the Etihad Airways Mobile App.
This version includes the following enhancements:

1. Feature to make Multicity Bookings
2. Support for German and Italian languages

We have also included some bug fixes and general performance enhancements in this release.

Welcome to the updated version of the Etihad Airways Mobile App. We are working hard to make your app experience even better. This update includes the following features:
- iPhone X support
- Option to add and buy additional baggage for an existing booking
- Option to change seat(s) in an existing booking
- Bug fixes and performance enhancements

Send us your feedback from within the app or via MobileAppFeedback@etihad.ae. We look forward to hearing from you.

Welcome to the updated version of the Etihad Airways Mobile App. We are working hard to make your app experience even better. This update includes the following features:
- iPhone X support
- Option to add and buy additional baggage for an existing booking
- Option to change seat(s) in an existing booking
- Bug fixes and performance enhancements

Send us your feedback from within the app or via MobileAppFeedback@etihad.ae. We look forward to hearing from you.

We've improved the app to make it easier for you to make choices.
You'll see new brand visuals and more options on the home screen, to help you navigate more quickly.

We've improved the app to make it easier for you to make choices.

You'll see new brand visuals and more options on the home screen, to help you navigate more quickly.
The new Etihad Airways app lets you manage your travel plans quickly and easily on the fly. Search flights by voice, book Uber rides to your trips and much more.
The new Etihad Airways app lets you manage your travel plans quickly and easily on the fly. Search flights by voice, book Uber rides to your trips and much more.

Book flights with Etihad Guest Miles, send us a special request for your trip and make sure that you never miss an update about your flight with our new notification centre. We’ve also improved security with the option to set a 4-digit pin.
Enjoy access to thousands of newspapers and magazines in your language from 30 hours before you fly and during your journey
Enjoy access to thousands of newspapers and magazines in your language from 30 hours before you fly and during your journey
